wayfinding & placemaking

RSM Design is proud to be a WBE wayfinding & graphic design studio working in placemaking
projects: branding & environmental graphic design. RSM Design is a collection of diverse designers who look deeply and pull surrounding cues to connect people to place
column15: and those people to each other. As a WBE graphic design studio our branding and logo design is finely tuned
column17: and captures the spirit while making a statement. Through experiential graphic design we seamlessly integrate the brand into architecture & landscape creating a wayfinding signage system & master plan built on the values determined by client
column18: community or stakeholders. We work for the wow

and most importantly we work for people with vision.

RSM Design is a certified Women Business Enterprise (WBE) and is certified nationally by the National Women Business Owners Corporation. As well
